articles.title: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang contracts Covid days before AFCON after he's seen partying in Dubai - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Arsenal striker, who was stripped of the captain's armband last month for three different disciplinary breaches, reportedly contracted the virus on his arrival to Cameroon.
articles.content:

articles.title: Arsenal are fined £20,000 by the FA after admitting they breached player conduct rules - Daily Mail
articles.description: Arsenal have been issued with a £20,000 fine by the FA after admitting they breached player conduct rules following their feisty Premier League game against Manchester City.
